sentence.text: Therefore, we evaluated the roles of peptidyl-serine phosphorylation, regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination, and phosphorylated SIRT6 and their relationships in breast carcinoma.

entity.text: regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Inhibition of peptidyl-serine phosphorylation decreased the proliferative and invasive activity of cancer cells.
Knockdown of regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination decreased the proliferation and invasiveness of cancer cells.

entity.text: regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: This study demonstrates that peptidyl-serine phosphorylation and regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination are indicators of poor prognosis for breast carcinomas and that CSNK2A1-mediated phosphorylation of SIRT6 might be involved in the progression of breast carcinoma

entity.text: regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
